content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Lights Out The target is blinded until the end of its next turn. Bludgeoning
Bicep Wound The target is enfeebled 1 until healed. Piercing
Bewildering Display The target is flat-footed until the end of its next turn. Slashing
Roaring Blast The target is deafened until healed. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #52
